fsrtool.name: fsrtool_cron
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_cron` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `interwal` mediumint(3) DEFAULT NULL, `time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `description` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
